description:
Usagi, Mako, and Ami see a boy being attacked by one of Ail and An’s Cardian monsters. To Mako’s surprise, the boy turns out to be her childhood friend Shinozaki.
Source: hulu

titles.title: El caballero de la luz de luna
For Whom Is the White Rose? The Moonlight Knight Appears
Le chevalier du clair de lune
Shiroi Bara wa Dare ni? Tsukikage no Kishi Toujou
白いバラは誰に? 月影の騎士登場
